Laden der Daten

```{r}
all <- read_csv("all.csv")
```
```{r message=FALSE}
i <- split(all$`Book-Author`,all$`User-ID`)
txn <- as(i, "transactions")
basket_rules <- apriori(txn, parameter = list(sup = 0.0005, conf = 0.001, minlen=2, target="rules"))
```
